name: AssetEase
description: AssetEase is an asset management system designed for businesses to track company assets used by employees. It supports returnable and non-returnable assets, with features for requesting, approving, and managing assets efficiently.
shortDescription: A modern asset management system for tracking company assets.

name: Chill Gamer
description: Chill Gamer is a web-based quiz application with gamification elements, fetching quiz data from an API. It tracks user progress and displays a summary of quiz results, enhancing the learning experience with a sleek UI.
shortDescription: A gamified quiz application with API-based questions.

name: Portfolio
description: A responsive portfolio showcasing my skills, projects, and developer journey with sleek design and smooth animations.
shortDescription: A sleek portfolio with smooth animations and responsive design.
